creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
it would be great to use probably POIFS to create .msg files from java MIME data
structures.

Others have been asking for this -
http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jspa?messageID=3752249&#3752249 and some people
at least appear to have been able to modify existing .msg files
(http://article.gmane.org/gmane.comp.jakarta.poi.user/1008/match=outlook and
http://article.gmane.org/gmane.comp.jakarta.poi.devel/2716/match=outlook+msg and
http://article.gmane.org/gmane.comp.jakarta.poi.devel/9225/match=outlook+msg)

see also https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=350819 for a corresponding
Thunderbird RFE
creator: hauser@acm.org
